content: Selling several loaded, graded all-silver Cas 1 BTC starting at 1.75 BTC 1.5 BTC. All in visually stunning condition with no milk spotting, grades starting at MS-66 and going up to MS-70 (only one of these, and would expect an exceptional premium).Escrow through MJ if desired. PM with serious inquiries. Thanks! (click for hi-res)
